original: LJUNGDAHL, Vilmar Severin, Fil Lic, Egna-hemsdirektör, Förutv Statsråd, Ingelstad, f Nöbbele, Kronob l, 28/3 92 av lantbr C L o Christina Andersson, gm Inez Rydell. Fil kand Upps 13, fil lic 17. Avd.ch v sv be-skickn i Petrograd 17, tf konsul i Omsk 18, skattm o omb.man i Kronob l hush.sällsk 26 —40, egnahemsdir 40, tax.nmds ordf 27—33, vkst dir f Nya Växjöbladets Boktr.AB 34, statsr o chef f f in. dep 19/6—28/9 36, led av kartv.komm, av Växjö stds domkap 37, ordf 1 Kronob l krist.styr, i länsarb.nmd, i jord-br.kasseutrdri av år 38, l :a kamm (bf) sed. 43. RNO.
translated: LJUNGDAHL, Vilmar Severin, Fil Lic, Own home director, Former Minister of State, Ingelstad, born in Nöbbele, Kronob l (County), March 28, 1892, son of farmer C L and Christina Andersson, married to Inez Rydell. Bachelor of Arts Uppsala 1913, Licentiate of Philosophy 1917. Department chief of Swedish delegation in Petrograd 1917, acting consul in Omsk 1918, treasurer and representative of Kronob l household society 1926-1940, own home director since 1940, chairman of the tax board 1927-1933, growth director of Nya Växjöbladets Boktr.AB 1934, Minister and Chief of the Interior Department from June 19 to September 28, 1936, member of the mapping committee, of the Växjö city cathedral chapter in 1937, Chairman of Kronob l Christian board, of the county labor board, of the agricultural funds commission in 1938, Member of the First Chamber (representing farmers) since 1943. Recommended for the Order of the Northern Star (RNO).
